class.name: EngineDebugger
class.description: [EngineDebugger] handles the communication between the editor and the running game. It is active in the running game. Messages can be sent/received through it. It also manages the profilers.

method.name: clear_breakpoints
method.description: Clears all breakpoints.

method.name: debug
method.description: Starts a debug break in script execution, optionally specifying whether the program can continue based on [param can_continue] and whether the break was due to a breakpoint.

method.name: get_depth
method.description: Returns the current debug depth.

method.name: get_lines_left
method.description: Returns the number of lines that remain.

method.name: has_capture
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a capture with the given name is present otherwise [code]false[/code].

method.name: has_profiler
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a profiler with the given name is present otherwise [code]false[/code].

method.name: insert_breakpoint
method.description: Inserts a new breakpoint with the given [param source] and [param line].

method.name: is_active
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the debugger is active otherwise [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_breakpoint
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given [param source] and [param line] represent an existing breakpoint.

method.name: is_profiling
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a profiler with the given name is present and active otherwise [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_skipping_breakpoints
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the debugger is skipping breakpoints otherwise [code]false[/code].

method.name: line_poll
method.description: Forces a processing loop of debugger events. The purpose of this method is just processing events every now and then when the script might get too busy, so that bugs like infinite loops can be caught.

method.name: profiler_add_frame_data
method.description: Calls the [code]add[/code] callable of the profiler with given [param name] and [param data].

method.name: profiler_enable
method.description: Calls the [code]toggle[/code] callable of the profiler with given [param name] and [param arguments]. Enables/Disables the same profiler depending on [param enable] argument.

method.name: register_message_capture
method.description: Registers a message capture with given [param name]. If [param name] is "my_message" then messages starting with "my_message:" will be called with the given callable. Callable must accept a message string and a data array as argument. If the message and data are valid then callable must return [code]true[/code] otherwise [code]false[/code].

method.name: register_profiler
method.description: Registers a profiler with the given [param name]. See [EngineProfiler] for more information.

method.name: remove_breakpoint
method.description: Removes a breakpoint with the given [param source] and [param line].

method.name: script_debug
method.description: Starts a debug break in script execution, optionally specifying whether the program can continue based on [param can_continue] and whether the break was due to a breakpoint.

method.name: send_message
method.description: Sends a message with given [param message] and [param data] array.

method.name: set_depth
method.description: Sets the current debugging depth.

method.name: set_lines_left
method.description: Sets the current debugging lines that remain.

method.name: unregister_message_capture
method.description: Unregisters the message capture with given [param name].

method.name: unregister_profiler
method.description: Unregisters a profiler with given [param name].
